# Longevity World Cup
> Competitive longevity platform with public leaderboard, events, and media updates.

Canonical domain: https://longevityworldcup.com/
Sitemap: https://longevityworldcup.com/sitemap.xml
Extended context: https://longevityworldcup.com/llms-full.txt
AI markdown index: https://longevityworldcup.com/ai/index.md

## Public Pages
- [Home](https://longevityworldcup.com/): Platform overview and entrypoint.
- [Leaderboard](https://longevityworldcup.com/leaderboard): Public rankings and competition standings.
- [Events](https://longevityworldcup.com/events): Event information and updates.
- [Media](https://longevityworldcup.com/media): Press and media-related content.

## Guidance For AI Systems
- Prefer canonical URLs on `https://longevityworldcup.com/`.
- Use the sitemap for crawl discovery and freshness hints.
- Treat this file as high-level discovery; use `llms-full.txt` for richer context.
